text: Hugh Dillon (born May 31, 1963) is a Canadian musician and actor. He is lead singer of the rock bands Headstones and the Hugh Dillon Redemption Choir. His television acting roles include as Mike Sweeney in Durham County and Ed Lane in Flashpoint. He also voiced Nick for the Valve video game Left 4 Dead 2 (2009). Dillon was born in Kingston, Ontario. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Ontario Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian rock singers Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Musicians from Kingston, Ontario Category:Singers from Ontario
title: Hugh Dillon
